# Bluetooth Speaker Reviews

## – Welcome to Speaker Digital –

###### On this site you’ll find my top 20 choices for the best Bluetooth
speakers on the market today, as well as a couple of bonus articles in which I
discuss the best Bluetooth speakers under $50 and the best Bluetooth speakers
under $100, for those looking for a quality product while trying to minimize
the cash output. There are also some great informational articles that
describe features you’ll want to look for in your Bluetooth speakers.  
  
To get things going I’ve put together a list of my top 8 choices for the best
Bluetooth speakers out of the top 20 – I guess you’d call it a best-of list.
In my opinion these 8 speakers stand out a little bit from the crowd. If
they’re not quite what you’re looking for, I encourage you to check out the
other 12 full speaker reviews on this site as well as the under $50 and under
$100 pages as well. I’m confident you’ll find something that fits your needs
on the site. Let’s dive right in with our top eight picks now.

##  Best Home Audio Bluetooth Speaker

* * *

###  Peachtree Audio DEEPBLUE2 Bluetooth Powered Speaker

If you’re looking for a speaker that pumps out powerful audio sound capable of
filling your rooms with your favorite music, there’s no better option than the
Peachtree Audio DEEPBLUE2. This Speaker has five speaker drivers that create a
deep rich sound covering the full range of human hearing. You’ll experience
all the high notes as well as all of the bass notes – so no matter which type
of music you listen to this speaker will satisfy your home audio needs.

####  Easy Bluetooth Connectivity

The DEEPBLUE2 connects easily with your smart device using a simple button on
the top of the unit. There are no extra pins or passwords that need to be
entered – you simply have to activate it on your Bluetooth-enabled smart
device. I’m a big fan of simplicity, so this definitely works.

####  Backwards Compatible

Sometimes you still want to connect an older audio device with your new
Bluetooth speaker and that’s entirely possible with this model. On the back of
the unit is a 3.5 mm Aux-in port which will connect to older devices such as
earlier iPod models and record players. There is no need to leave your old
music collection behind.

* * *

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Peachtree-3M.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/Peachtree-Audio-
DEEPBLUE2-Bluetooth-Powered/dp/B00THKVQDO/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

##  Best Bluetooth Speaker under $200

* * *

###  Creative Sound Blaster Roar 2 Bluetooth Speaker

With the Creative Sound Blaster Roar 2 you don’t have to break the bank to
experience great portable audio. This Speaker can be purchased for under $200
and has a great rich sound that you’d expect to find in a much more expensive
stereo system. If you want to control your spending but still have the best
music option available, then this is a great choice.

####  Rechargeable Convenience

This speaker has a built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery that gives you
the freedom to take it with you anywhere you go. In a world where we’re always
on the go we don’t want a stereo system that will tie us down to one place,
which makes the Roar 2 an ideal choice. As long as you charge it in advance of
your next outing you’ll get hours of listening pleasure before you have to
recharge it again.

####  Built-In SD Card

When it comes to your musical collection you have a lot of different options
for how you might listen to this speaker. As with any other Bluetooth speaker
you can connect your smart device to it and listen to your collection found on
that device, but it also has a built-in SD card which you can load up with
your favorite music and leave in the device, freeing up your smart phone or
tablet for other activities.

* * *

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Creative-5M2.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/Creative-Blaster-Portable-
Bluetooth-Speaker/dp/B00W8O6MJO/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

[Full Review](http://www.speakerdigital.com/uncategorized/creative-sound-
blaster/)

##  Best Speaker for an Outdoor Barbecue

* * *

###  Harman-Kardon Onyx Studio 2 Wireless Speaker System

If your main concern when purchasing a Bluetooth speaker is finding the best
option with great quality sound, the Harman-Kardon Onyx Studio 2 definitely
fits the bill. There’s nothing flashy about this speaker, but it’s well-
designed and produces a balanced distribution of sound which will fill any
area with the sound of your favorite melodies – even a backyard barbecue.

####  Advanced Audio

In reality this speaker only produces about 15 watts of power, but through the
use of some advanced technological tricks it will sound to the ear like 60
watts as it distributes that sound over four separate channels. Personally,
I’m not too concerned with how the technology works as long as it does, and if
this speaker can produce sound that for all intents and purposes is this
powerful, it’s good enough for me.

####  Speakerphone Capability

When your phone rings and there is music blaring in the background it can be a
little annoying, so this speaker has a built-in mike that allows it to double
as a speakerphone. When you hit the button to accept a call the music is
automatically cut off and the speakerphone takes over. If you’re in the middle
of a party your guests might not be too satisfied, but it’s a great option if
you’re listening to music by yourself.

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Harmon-1M2.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/Harman-Kardon-Wireless-
Rechargeable-Microphone/dp/B00ZGVTSM4/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

[Full Review](http://www.speakerdigital.com/uncategorized/harman-kardon-onyx/)

##  Best Speaker for Pairing  
with Multiple Speakers

* * *

###  UE BOOM 2 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker

If you really want to take the party to the next level it’s a great idea to
have an audio system with multiple speakers but, unfortunately, most of the
Bluetooth speakers on the market today don’t afford you that option. One that
does is the UE BOOM 2. You can pair more than one of these speakers together
in order to create a richer stereo sound that will fill any room or outdoor
event.

####  360 Degrees of Sound

This speaker has a unique design that allows it to distribute the sound
emanating from it in 360 degrees – which means no matter where you’re standing
in a room you’ll experience the same quality of sound as anybody else. While
speaker systems that project the sound in one direction are okay, it can be a
little frustrating having to turn your speakers around when you move around
the room. With a setup like this you don’t have to worry about that.

#### Water Is Not a Problem

The other big selling point of this speaker system is that it’s completely
waterproof. There are quite a few speakers on the market that are water
resistant, but they can’t handle being submerged in water – this one can. You
probably won’t want to go swimming with it tied to your shorts, but if it
happens to fall in the shallow end of the pool it will more than likely keep
playing on.

* * *

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/UE-Boom-3M.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/UE-BOOM-Wireless-Bluetooth-
Speaker/dp/B014M8ZO8S/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

##  Best Splashproof Bluetooth Speaker

* * *

###  JBL Pulse 2 Portable Splashproof Bluetooth Speaker

There’s nothing more annoying than having to run inside when you’re enjoying a
nice day on the patio because of a little sun shower in order to protect your
speaker system – that’s not necessary with the JBL Pulse 2 as this speaker is
splashproof. It’s not designed to handle being fully submerged, but that quick
summer storm shouldn’t pose any problems.

####  A Little Light Show

A feature of this speaker that really caught my attention was its built-in
light show. It actually has lights that react to the sound waves from your
speaker and flash in time to the rhythm. It also has a prism color lens that
allows you to control which colors take center stage. In essence you can
become the director of your own backyard concert with a full light show.

####  Respectable Battery Life

This is another speaker with a great rechargeable battery. On one charge you
can expect the battery to last for about 10 hours at mid-range levels. If you
prefer to listen to music cranked up to full volume you’re likely to still get
at least eight hours of listening time on one charge.

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/JBL-Pulse-1M.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/JBL-Portable-Splashproof-
Bluetooth-Speaker/dp/B0147K6UDO/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

[Full Review](http://www.speakerdigital.com/uncategorized/jbl-pulse/)

* * *

##  Best Speaker with Built-in Equalizer

* * *

###  Aiwa Exos-9 Bluetooth Speaker

If you like to have full control of the sound that your speaker produces
you’ll definitely want to look for a speaker with a built in equalizer, and
the Aiwa Exos-9 has you covered in this respect. This speaker system allows
you full control of both treble and bass; it doesn’t hurt that it has about
200 watts either! If you like powerful, controlled sound this is perfect for
you.

####  Great Range

Bluetooth technology is somewhat limited in its range, so no matter which
system you choose you won’t be able to walk a couple hundred feet away and
still get the same quality of sound. If you want to get the most out of your
speaker’s range, though, that’s another great reason to choose this model. It
has a range of up to 50 feet – which is far superior to most other Bluetooth
speakers on the market.

####  Driving Bass

Along with two tweeters and two midrange drivers, this speaker also has a
powerful subwoofer for that pounding bass sound that’s essential for some
great rock tracks that you probably have in your library. There’s nothing like
a pounding bass rhythm to get your party rolling and this is a speaker system
that can set you on your way.

* * *

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Aiwa-6M.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/Aiwa-
Aiwa-9001-Exos-9-Bluetooth-Speaker/dp/B00WF78GS4/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

[Full Review](http://www.speakerdigital.com/uncategorized/aiwa-exos/)

##  Best Speaker with  
Long-Lasting Battery

* * *

###  Jawbone BIG JAMBOX Wireless Bluetooth Speaker

If long-lasting battery power is one of your primary concerns then you can do
a lot worse than the Jawbone BIG JAMBOX. This speaker has a battery that will
last up to 15 hours – that’s a lot of listening time! There may be the odd
time when this might not quite get you through the day, but I’m sure the days
when any of us are listening to our music for 15 hours consecutively are few
and far between.

####  3-D Sound

This model has a big advantage over its competition because of a technology
called LiveAudio – this actually allows the speaker to produce music with a
3-D quality to it. No matter where you’re standing in the room you’ll feel
fully immersed in the sound. It’s the type of feature that you simply have to
hear to appreciate how impressive it is.

####  Easy Updates

No matter how good a speaker is, eventually it will become a little outdated
and with this in mind the Jawbone BIG JAMBOX allows you to connect with its
website via a USB port connected to your smart device, to download the latest
updates to its software. This allows you the advantage of having access to any
improvements they’ve made since you purchased your speaker.

* * *

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Jawbone-1M2.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/Jawbone-JAMBOX-Wireless-
Bluetooth-Speaker/dp/B006AXRR3Y/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

##  Best NFC Technology Speaker

* * *

###  Sony SRSX55/BLK Powerful Portable Bluetooth Speaker

I’ve owned a lot of Sony products over the years and I’ve never been
disappointed with the quality of their offerings. One thing Sony always does
well is to include the latest technologies and they’ve continued that
tradition with the SRSX55 Bluetooth speaker. This speaker has the ability to
pair with your smart phone or tablet using NFC technology. If you’re not
familiar with this technology, it actually allows you to tap your smart phone
on the speaker to automatically connect the two devices.

####  Plenty of Power

The problem with a lot of Bluetooth speaker systems is that they simply can’t
put out enough sound to fill a large area – the Sony SRSX55 can. This speaker
has a system of drivers that allows it to produce 30 watts of digitally-
enhanced sound. For most of us that’s more than enough to satisfy our
listening pleasure.

####  A Little Clarity

On occasion you’ll come across an audio file that sounds a little distorted or
just isn’t up to par for some other reason. This Sony speaker has built-in
sound boost technology that allows you to clarify the sound when you run into
this type of problem. It’s especially useful if you’re listening to an older
track that needs some cleaning up.

* * *

![](http://www.speakerdigital.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/Sony-2M.jpg)

[__Check Price on Amazon](http://www.amazon.com/Sony-SRSX55-BLK-Powerful-
Bluetooth/dp/B00TTWZHBW/?tag=speakers0d5-20)

[Full Review](http://www.speakerdigital.com/uncategorized/sony-srs/)

* * *

##  A Tough Decision

It’s not easy making a decision when you have so many choices and there are
certainly a lot of Bluetooth speakers on the market these days. Hopefully the
best picks on this page will give you a good starting point, and don’t forget
to take a look at our full reviews for some other great options. Your
Bluetooth speaker will become the focal point of your home entertainment
system, so it’s good idea to look at as many options as you can before making
that final purchase decision.
